name: Notificare
overview: On everything that happens on the internet and even in real-life that is important and you want act on, Notificare puts you in control! Let’s say someone comments on your weblog and you want to approve it before it appears on your site. Notificare sends a push notification and offers the direct action with one click! We developed an iOS app that receives all messages. And made a platform with all sort of services. Developers can set up their own services and offer it to their customers. It’s the future platform of human interaction on what happens on the internet.
